list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the internal organ in which the major part of the digestion of food occurs, being (in humans and many mammals) a pear-shaped enlargement of the alimentary canal linking the esophagus to the small intestine.
an appetite for food or drink.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she doesn't have the stomach to eat anything
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy không có dạ dày để ăn bất cứ thứ gì

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: consume (food or drink) without feeling or being sick.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if you cannot stomach orange juice, try apple juice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu bạn không thể chịu đựng nước cam, hãy thử nước táo
